articles.description: Adesanya was stopped in the final round of his UFC title fight against Alex Pereira and he thinks referee Steve Mazzagatti would have kept the fight going
articles.content:
Israel Adesanya thinks he would have reached the final bell of his UFC title fight with Alex Pereira if Steve Mazzagatti was the referee for the fight. 
 Middleweight champion Adesanya, 33, was look… [+2530 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Rohit Sharma only decided where to hide on field. He didn't take a single call' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With Rohit Sharma already 35 and the next T20 World Cup two years away, this certainly in the time for a change in guard, feels a former India pacer. He reckons either Hardik Pandya or Rishabh Pant can take over the command of the team and usher India's T20 t…
articles.content: Under Rohit Sharma, the Indian cricket team has suffered defeats in two big multi-team tournaments in three months. In September, India failed to qualify for the semifinals of the Asia Cup, which was… [+2232 chars]

articles.title: Gerald Coetzee gets maiden Test call-up for Australia tour | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Theunis de Bruyn, who last featured for South Africa in 2019, has been recalled after a successful first-class season
articles.content:
Coetzee, 22, earns his place after impressing for his domestic team Knights - picking up 40 wickets at an average of 28.82 and a career-best 4-47 © Getty

articles.author: Matt Roller
articles.title: England's grit, depth and brilliance shows success is no flash in the pan - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: An abundance of matchwinners, in the team and on the bench, augurs well for more success
articles.content: Sam Curran and Adil Rashid, who played key roles in England's win, lead the race out to the middle at the moment of victory  •  Getty Images
